thread.section_title: Snug as a Bug Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Snug as a Bug | snugasabug.com
thread.title: Michelle
thread.title_full: Snug as a Bug reviewed by Michelle

author: Michelle
title: Michelle
text:
The adjustable sun hat is the only hat that my daughter allows to be on her head. She doesn't fuss or even try to remove it. It is the best sun hat on the market and we have tried lots of others!
The company is great to deal with. The hat that I wanted wasn't in stock and they sent me an email with alternatives. We were leaving for holidays and they made sure that the hat arrived in time so that we could take it with us. Great customer service!
